name: Slim Gmail Compose Button
description: The Gmail compose button in the new Material Gmail design is nice, but I think it takes up too much space, especially for people like me with lots of labels. This style non-intrusively makes the compose button a bit smaller.
additional_info:
1.3

Update: I tweaked the margins a little bit to make things line up a little better.

--------------------

1.2

Update: This style no longer affects the compose button when you toggle the menu size.
--------------------

1.1

I added some polishing touches:

 - The compose button will now be centered above the label list.
 - The compose button is now vertically aligned to be in line with the top row of the gmail interface with the checkboxes.

--------------------

1.0
Please leave any feedback using the "Send feedback" button and I'll be happy to look into it. :)
